title: The Ever-changing lowlands
creator_credit: Tony Ianzelo, Joseph Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: For students of Canadian geography, this film shows the characteristics of the Quebec-Ontario region bordering the United States, where most of Canada’s population settled, and where manufacturing and agriculture thrive.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Ianzelo, Joseph Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
